text: Nasrul Abit (24 December 1954 â€“ 28 August 2021) was an Indonesian politician. He was a member of the Great Indonesia Movement Party. He was the 8th Vice Governor of West Sumatra from 12 February 2016 until 12 February 2021. He was also the Deputy Regent of Pesisir Selatan Regency from 2000 to 2005. Abit was born in Pesisir Selatan Regency. Abit died on 28 August 2021 in Padang, Indonesia of COVID-19 at the age of 66. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Indonesia Category:Indonesian politicians Category:2021 deaths Category:West Sumatra
title: Nasrul Abit
